{{Description|It is easy to sink. But even so, she desires to freeze this oncoming tide.}}
'''Glacial Illumination''' is [[Eula]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{Talent Note|energy frame|107}}
* {{Talent Note|cooldown frame|98}}
* The initial slash does not grant energy stacks.
* As the description mentions, attacks need to deal DMG to enemies to charge the Lightfall Sword. Thus, hitting shields from Abyss Mages, Shieldwall Mitachurls, etc. will not grant energy stacks.
* The Lightfall Sword can no longer gain energy stacks once its exploding animation begins.
* {{Talent Note|character=Eula|talent=Glacial Illumination|no snapshot|Lightfall Sword's damage}}
